text: Claudio Taddei (December 22, 1966 – August 9, 2019) was a Uruguayan-Swiss singer-songwriter and painter. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Uruguayan emigrants to Switzerland Category:Uruguayan singer-songwriters Category:Swiss singer-songwriters Category:20th-century Uruguayan painters Category:20th-century male artists Category:20th-century Swiss painters Category:21st-century Swiss painters Category:Male painters
title: Claudio Taddei
